org.cfpm.factbaseExtension
Class FactBaseAssertAll

java.lang.Object
  org.nlogo.api.DefaultCommand
      org.cfpm.factbaseExtension.FactBaseAssertAll
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.nlogo.api.Command, org.nlogo.api.Primitive, scala.ScalaObject
public class FactBaseAssertAll
extends org.nlogo.api.DefaultCommand

This class implements the "assert-all" primitive for the factbase extension. In Netlogo terms, asserting a list of facts is a command, that means using the assert-all primitive does not return any result. If the facts to be asserted are already contained in the fact base, nothing happens. To call this primitive from NetLogo, use factbase:assert-all fact-base list-of-facts

Author:
Ruth Meyer

perform

public void perform(org.nlogo.api.Argument[] args,
                    org.nlogo.api.Context context)
             throws org.nlogo.api.ExtensionException,
                    org.nlogo.api.LogoException
Performs the assertion. First argument args[0] has to be a fact base, second argument args[1] has to be a list of lists (the facts to be asserted).

Parameters:
args - the arguments to this call of assert-all
context - the NetLogo context
Throws:
org.nlogo.api.ExtensionException - if any of the arguments are of the wrong type
org.nlogo.api.LogoException
See Also:
Command.perform(org.nlogo.api.Argument[], org.nlogo.api.Context)
